note:
By day, cybersecurity, data protection, teaching, training and explaining, rants about Windows, reminiscences about ZX Spectrums.

By night, piano, guitar and singing teacher, pretty much anything musical theatre, and mucking about in the recording studio.

Dad to a wonderful daughter, husband to an incredible woman.

My header picture has our two beautiful Shiba Inus, Yogi & Venus, off out for a walk in the village. Both chased each other over the rainbow bridge in mid-2022.

September 2023 saw us introduce Pixel to our household, a black-and-tan Shiba Inu puppy.

Expect chats about parenting, fair weather cycling, misunderstood popular psychology, cheese, coffee, whisk(e)y, toast science, crumpeting, Haribo appreciation, and anything you can see from the top of the Malvern Hills.

"My superpower's draining fun from parties" - Marian Call

fields.name: Song
fields.value: Things Behind The Sun - Nick Drake
